about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I'm a computer scientist undergraduate with a solid background in electronics and robotics. Passionate about technology, cars and motorsport, I focus on developing innovative solutions that combine programming and electronic design, with particular interest in automotive and racing applications.
about.paragraph2: My experience ranges from developing web applications (Node.js, Flask, ASP.NET) to integrating enterprise systems like Business Central, from IoT and electronics (Arduino, PCB with KiCad) to software analysis and development with focus on automation and artificial intelligence. I have worked on projects including AI-powered ticket management, car rental platforms and smart parking solutions.
about.paragraph3: I strongly believe in the importance of a solid methodological approach, using UML for requirements analysis, Git/GitHub for versioning and Agile methodologies for development. My soft skills include teamwork, problem solving, technical leadership and customer orientation, always with clear communication and adaptability.
